Train¶

train.main(config_path: pathlib.Path, dataset_path: pathlib.Path, output_path: pathlib.Path) → None[source]¶

Main function responsible for training classification model.

Parameters

  • config_path¶ (Path) – path to main config (of DefaultConfig class)

  • dataset_path¶ (Path) – path to dataset

  • output_path¶ (Path) – path to directory where experiment will be saved
